test_results.reference_range: Normal: 12-16, Increased in essential thrombocythemia and iron deficiency disorders, Higher than normal indicative of liver disease, May be seen in marrow failure or 170 x thrombocytopenia conditions
Normal: 1.80-4.50, Increased in essential thrombocythemia and iron deficiency disorders
May be seen in conditions such as thrombocytopenia and platelet disorders
